exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros x y z. split. - intros H. split. + apply Rle_minus_l. rewrite Rabs_minus_sym. apply Rabs_triang_inv. apply H. + apply Rle_minus_r in H. apply Rle_minus_r in H. apply H. - intros [H1 H2]. apply Rle_minus_l in H2. apply Rle_minus_r. apply Rle_minus_r. apply H2.
